alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Shelby (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 01 at 5:25PM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern DeSoto, northwestern Marshall, northwestern Benton, southern Fayette and southeastern Shelby Counties through 545 PM CST... At 525 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Olive Branch, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Southaven, Collierville, Germantown, Olive Branch, Memphis, Somerville, Mt Pleasant, Southeast Memphis, Michigan City, Slayden, Macon, Piperton, Rossville, Moscow, Williston, La Grange, Cayce, Cedarview, Handy Corner and Capleville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CST for northeastern and northwestern Mississippi...and west Tennessee.
